attributes.action: call an immediate referendum on the disguised EU Constitution recently accepted by ex PM Blair.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The so called treaty is only the EU Constitution (which was rejected by the voters) with a bit of rather obvious disguise. Blair promised a referendum and is now going back on his word - not for the first time!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
